item.title: TikTok Creators Sue Montana Over State's Ban of Platform
item.description: TikTok Creators Sue Montana Over State’s Ban of Platform A group of TikTok creators have filed a lawsuit against Montana’s attorney general, alleging that the state’s ban on the social media platform is unconstitutional and violates the First Amendment. The lawsuit argues that the ban is an attempt to censor speech and that it is based on unfounded fears about TikTok’s security.
